title: Are Red-Flag Laws the Future of Gun Control?
sub_head: These maniacs are looking for publicity or notoriety, so they do tend to broadcast themselves.
body:
Holman Jenkins, Jr. is on to an important part of the solution in “Red Flag Laws Are as Good as the Data” (Business World, May 28). I’ve got a libertarian streak a mile long, but the expectation of privacy on social media is close to zero. Besides, these maniacs are looking for publicity or notoriety, so they do tend to broadcast themselves.
Conan M. Ward
